TopicTitle: OMG. If you like Star Wars...

Articles.Content:
I'm not sure what to say about this other than to pre-apologize for both our conveniences... 'Cause if you clicked here, I'm about to waste 43 minutes of your life.

This....crazy person??? put every word uttered in Star Wars a New Hope in... wait for it... alphabetical order.

Extra credit if you make it to the end.

Edit- Reflections

Favorite word: Luke. (Luke! LUUKE?!)

The word lightsaber is said only once, but they sure get waved around a lot.

Edited June 5, 2014 by Aethon
Um.. Wow. I somehow managed to watch 5 minutes of that. This was put together by one dedicated guy
Hmmm... i could think of at least one or two things i would like to do more than cutting a movie into pieces and sort em... really at least one or two...
Managed to go 10 min before rage quiting. Whoever did this has ALOT of time on his/her hands.

Wow. What?

That must have taken eternity to put together!

+1 and a cookie (sorry for no teasing you [dedicated guy] by saying I would give a cookie)
30 hours to put that together, he obviously has a slight case of OCD.
That is a lot of free time.
time is definetely an untouchable form of richess
